Name: Starfield Wars - 沙罗曼蛇 3D
About the game: Starfield Wars is a high-speed 3D infinite racing game. Explore the super beautiful universe and escape the big monsters of various planets. 20+monster Boss, 100 levels, 10 hours of game time. Win the game victory. Race at break-neck speeds through an ever-changing landscape. Collect credits as you race, then use them to purchase items in the integrated shop. Features * Various super cool big monsters * Complete game with addictive gameplay * Integrated store with in-game currency * Multi-screen menu system * Looping intro and game music
